effect.name: DC shift
effect.description: Apply a DC shift to the audio. This can be useful to remove a DC offset (caused perhaps by a hardware problem in the recording chain) from the audio. The effect of a DC offset is reduced headroom and hence volume. The astats filter can be used to determine if a signal has a DC offset.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.shift
DC shift
parameter.comment: Set the DC shift, allowed range is [-1, 1]. It indicates the amount to shift the audio.

parameter.name: av.limitergain
Limiter gain
parameter.comment: Optional. It should have a value much less than 1 (e.g. 0.05 or 0.02) and is used to prevent clipping.
